Frequently Asked Questions

When Is The Next D Con-4 Program?

The second round of our program will go from February 15th – 26th!

What Is The Time Commitment For Each Day?

We will be meeting Monday through Friday 4:30 – 7:30PST.

What Do I Need To Have For D Con-4?

An open heart & mind, a journal and access to Zoom ❤️

How Can I Stay Updated On The Program?

You can either stay updated on this site or follow @d_con4 on Instagram!

Where Is D Con-4 Taking Place?

During the pandemic, everything will take place online! Once that gets figured out, we will see…

When Do Submissions For The Second Program Opening?

February 1st!

I’m Financially Struggling In The Pandemic, But I Really Want To Be A Part Of This Program. What Can I Do?

D Con-4 will be granting a full scholarship to one student, so follow D Con-4’s Instagram for more information regarding that! Aside from that, we will also accept payment plans with no interest as long as you communicate with Danyel!

Apply

The application for D Con-4’s second round is now open! As mentioned in the application, this cycle of applications will close February 7th! If you have any more questions than the ones mentioned above and that aren’t answered in the application, feel free to contact Danyel Moulton with your inquiries! To learn more about the program, check out the Home page for program details!
